aka: The Mystery of Casa Matusita II: The First Guest

cast.name: 马尔科姆·麦克道威尔 Malcolm McDowell
本杰明·维库纳 Benjamín Vicuña

writer.name: 科莱特·弗里德曼 Colette Freedman

this_title: The Mystery of Casa Matusita II: The Five Guests
trans_title: The Mystery of Casa Matusita II: The First Guest
introduction: When grunge punk UCLA history major, Kate Jensen researches her great-grandfather's descent into hysteria at Lima Peru's infamous "Casa Matusita", she unwittingly starts a dangerous journey of discovery. En route, she meets former priest, Father Robert who has his own agenda with the alleged cursed property. Together, they embark on a trek through time, unravelling the truth and the connection to Robert's brother, who perished at the house under suspicious circumstances.
chinese_title: The Mystery of Casa Matusita II: The Five Guests
